snippet: Greg Mortenson, author of the best-selling book “’Three Cups of Tea,” has agreed to pay $1 million to compensate his Montana-based charity.
abstract: Greg Mortenson, author of the best-selling book Three Cups of Tea, agrees to pay $1 million to compensate his Montana-based charity Central Asia Institute for promoting the book.
lead_paragraph: Greg Mortenson, author of the best-selling book “’Three Cups of Tea,” has agreed to pay $1 million to compensate his Montana-based charity.
